desc_about: We offer simple, fast and accessible solutions for money transfers. Our experienced team ensures the security of your operations with advanced technologies.
hero_desc: Download the app and take your first step towards a green future!
hero_scan: Scan to download app. Compatible with 5 major platforms.
transfer_subtitle: There are 4 different and easy ways!
option_qr_desc: Instant payment by scanning a QR code.
option_user_desc: Send money easily and without commission
payment_title: Connectivity to local payment rails and currencies across
global_desc: Make any payment with a single tap. Complete payments to gaming platforms, social networks, and other online services in seconds.
mission_title:
Our mission is to provide innovative and sustainable
financial tools
mission_card1_desc: We continuously improve our services to be simple, user-friendly and meet customer needs.
mission_card2_desc: Our support team is always ready to answer your questions via live chat.
mission_card3_desc: Money transfers and other operations are performed in a way that saves you time.
wallet_title:
Double convenience digital
wallet and card in one app!
wallet_desc:
With Greenpay you get both wallet functionality and digital card features together.
Make your daily payments
with a single app.
greenchat_title: GreenChat — fast messaging, all in one app!
greenchat_desc: With GreenChat, messaging is simple, file sharing is secure, and notifications are always accessible. Thanks to its simple interface, you can manage all chats and files in one place without wasting time.
qr_title:
Scan the QR code now and download the
app from the platforms!
faq_contact: Get in touch with our support team.

faq_items.a: Our company provides convenient and modern solutions in the field of money transfers and financial operations.
Our services operate with simple steps and ensure customer comfort.
Yes, all payments are protected in accordance with modern security standards.
You can contact our team via live chat or email.
Commissions vary depending on the type of operation and the amount.

contact_title: Bring your business to the future with
contact_message_min: Message must be at least 10 characters
about_subtitle:
We ensure the security of operations and use advanced technologies
to provide our customers with high-level service.
about_card1_text: Security and reliability are our priorities. Every operation is thoroughly checked for potential risks. You can trust us and perform your transactions safely.
about_card2_text: All the services we offer as a payment system are easy and user-friendly. We constantly improve our interface to meet the needs of our customers.
about_card3_text: Our support team is always available to deeply understand the needs of our customers and provide them with the most optimal solutions for any questions or issues.
